info.description: This is the API server for OpenCM
info.title: OpenCM API

get.description: Get media file. This endpoint shouldn't be used. Use the frontend to get the media file directly from the bucket.
List all posts of a project by its id
get.summary: List all posts of a project

post.description: Create a new post with the given title, text content, image links, video links, is idea and scheduled at

patch.description: Add a post to a project idea queue by its id
patch.summary: Add a post to a project idea queue

patch.description: Move a post in the project queue by its current and new index
patch.summary: Move a post in the project queue

get.description: Get all queued posts of a project by its id
get.summary: Get all queued posts of a project

get.description: Get a post by its id

delete.description: Delete a post by its id. We might or might not want to implement pagination and filtering. For the time being, we will keep it simple.

patch.description: Update a post with the given title, text content, image links, video links, is idea and scheduled at
Archive a post by its id
Remove a post from a project queue by its id
patch.summary: Remove a post from a project queue

patch.description: Add a post to a project queue by its id
patch.summary: Add a post to a project queue

post.description: Add a social media publisher platform to a post by its id
post.summary: Add a social media publisher platform to a post

delete.description: Remove a social media publisher platform from a post by its id
delete.summary: Remove a social media publisher platform from a post

patch.description: Restore a post by its id
Schedule a post by its id
Unschedule a post by its id

get.description: List all projects that the user is a member of

post.description: Create a new project with the given name and description

get.description: Get a project by its ID

delete.description: Delete a project with the given ID

patch.description: Update a project with the given ID

post.description: Add a role to a user in a project
post.summary: Add a role to a user

patch.description: Add a time slot to a project
patch.summary: Add a time slot to a project

post.description: Add a user to a project by their email
post.summary: Add a user to a project

get.description: Get the default user platform info for a project
get.summary: Get the default user platform info

patch.description: Set the default user for a project
patch.summary: Set the default user for a project

delete.description: Disable a social platform for a project

post.description: Enable a social platform for a project

delete.description: Remove a role from a user in a project
delete.summary: Remove a role from a user

patch.description: Remove a time slot from a project
patch.summary: Remove a time slot from a project

delete.description: Remove a user from a project by their email
delete.summary: Remove a user from a project

get.description: Get the project schedule for a project
Get the social platforms enabled for a project
Get the roles of a user in a project
Validate post for all assigned social networks
get.summary: Validate post for all assigned social networks

post.description: Register a new user with username, password and email

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Assign an application role to a user

delete.description: Remove an application role from a user
